evidence.claim: Grace Care emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations which suggests use of healthcare-specific data handling.
References to FHIR standards suggest Grace Care's commitment to modern health data interoperability.
HL7 standards mentioned in relation to care coordination indicate adherence to health communication protocols.
Their approach to data security aligns with industry standards for health care data management including X12 for claims.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found indicating use of X12 or related API automation for health data exchange.
